DOC.brief_title: 0205 Esteem New Subject Enrollment Post Approval Study
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : To evaluate long-term safety efficacy Esteem Totally Implantable Hearing System ( hereafter call Esteem ) subject suffer moderate severe hearing loss . Questions : The following question answer : - Is Esteem effective 5 year follow-up ? - Is Esteem safe 5 year follow-up ? - Is incidence facial paresis/paralysis 1 month follow-up great 7 % ?
